## Bill of Materials
Access the bill of materials through the [Github Repo](https://github.com/hmcbiophotonics/openIVIS/blob/main/Summer%202024/Bill%20of%20Materials.xlsx) or in the table below.
```{python}
#| echo: false
import pandas as pd

# Local path to the Excel file
file_path = "Bill of Materials.xlsx"

# Read the Excel file
df = pd.read_excel(file_path)

# Display the table
df
```
